author: enridaga
msg: * Implementation of JenaReasoningService as basic interface for all Jena based rasoning services
* Abstract implementation of the above interface
** Support all the three reasoning service methods (classify, enrich, consistency check)
** Support for adding rules customizing the reasoner configuration
* Three kind of Jena reasoners (RDFS, OWL, OWLMini)

by Greg Sterijevski on the "dev" ML.
